main event: On the night of 9 July 1953, at Perrin Air Force Base in Texas, a pilot reported sighting an unidentified flying object that was described as round and white, moving straight up.
interesting points: The pilot attempted two passes at the object but could not get closer than a mile., The object emitted no sound during the observation., A total of seven objects were reported on 25 July, glowing yellowish-white and moving in a zigzag pattern., Observers reported the lights displayed an erratic and oscillating movement., Radar attempts to track the objects were inconclusive as they disappeared before a positive lock could be established.
sighted object: unidentified flying object (round and white light), seven glowing objects
location: Perrin Air Force Base, Texas, USA
witness description: 1st Lt R...R...., 1st Lt L... K..., 1st Lt J... W... H...
